banners.name: The Battle Banner
banners.rule: +1 Attack in the first Combat engagement.

banners.name: The Banner of Shielding
banners.rule: +1 Armour value until stand is lost.

banners.name: The Banner of Fortitude
banners.rule: +1 Hit in the first Combat engagement.

banners.name: The Banner of Steadfastness
banners.rule: One shooting hit after saves is ignored until stand is lost.

banners.name: The Banner of Fortune
banners.rule: Once per game re-roll all Attack dice either in the Shooting or Combat Phase.

weapons.name: Sword of Destruction
weapons.rule: One enemy unit in combat with the unit with the sword must re-roll one successful Armour roll each combat round.

weapons.name: Sword of Fate
weapons.rule: +1 Attack to the unit/character it the first Combat round.

weapons.name: Sword of Cleaving
weapons.rule: Re-roll one unsuccessful Attack dice per combat round.

weapons.name: Sword of Might
weapons.rule: +1 Attack to the unit/character in the Combat Phase.

items.name: Crown of Command
items.rule: First Generalâ€˜s command roll each turn may be against unmodified Command 10 value. If failed, the Crown is lost.

items.name: Helm of Dominion
items.rule: The General has +1 Command value (maximum 10) for duration of one Command phase.

items.name: Orb of Majesty
items.rule: The General can re-roll one failed Command roll against Command value of 8 with all usual adjustments.

items.name: Ring of Magic
items.rule: A Wizard is able to cast one spell without a roll.

items.name: Staff of Spellbinding
items.rule: If an enemy Wizard fails to cast a spell, he can be spellbound on roll of 4+. Spellbound Wizard has -1 to cast a spell. One use only.

items.name: Sceptre of Sovereignty
items.rule: A General may ignore one Blunder roll made by himself or any other characters. The blundered order counts as successful.

items.name: Scroll of Dispelling
items.rule: A Wizard can dispel one enemy spell.

items.name: Wand of Power
items.rule: A Wizard can add +1 to the attempt to cast one spell. 1 is always a fail.

items.name: Rod of Repetition
items.rule: If a Wizard casts a spell successfully, once per game he can immediately try to cast another spell.
